publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3564 Johann Lamont: The Draft Private Landlord Registration Modification (Scotland) Order 2005—That the Communities Committee recommends that the draft Private Landlord Registration Modification (Scotland) Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Malcolm Chisholm*
